=== Page 20 ===

## Attachment D

Manure Tracking Manifest For Existing Milk Cow Dairies Instructions:

1) Complete one manifest for each hauling event, for each destination.  A hauling event may last for several days, as long as the manure is being hauled to the same destination.

If there are multiple destinations, complete a separate form for each destination.

The operator must obtain the signature of the hauler upon completion of each manure-hauling event.

3)
The operator shall submit copies of manure/process wastewater tracking manifest(s) with the Annual 4)
Monitoring Report for Existing Milk Cow Dairies.
